name: intersection
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: intersection
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an occasion when two lines cross, or the place where this happens

example.eg: The intersection of the lines on the graph marks the point where we start to make a profit.
example.egtrans: 图上几条线的交点就是我们的开始盈利点。

dsense.name: intersection
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the place where two or more roads join or cross each other

example.eg: Turn right at the next intersection.
example.egtrans: 在下个十字路口向右拐。
